name: Nirsevimab effectiveness
term: (nirsevimab[Title/Abstract] OR "MEDI8897"[Title/Abstract]) AND (effectiveness[Title/Abstract] OR efficacy[Title/Abstract] OR "real-world"[Title/Abstract] OR "real world"[Title/Abstract] OR "clinical trial"[Publication Type] OR "randomized controlled trial"[Publication Type]) AND ("respiratory syncytial virus"[Title/Abstract] OR RSV[Title/Abstract])

name: RSV seasonality
term: ("respiratory syncytial virus"[Title/Abstract] OR RSV[Title/Abstract]) AND (seasonality[Title/Abstract] OR seasonal[Title/Abstract] OR "seasonal pattern"[Title/Abstract] OR "seasonal variation"[Title/Abstract] OR "seasonal distribution"[Title/Abstract] OR "seasonal trend"[Title/Abstract] OR "seasonal peak"[Title/Abstract] OR "seasonal outbreak"[Title/Abstract] OR "seasonal epidemic"[Title/Abstract] OR "seasonal activity"[Title/Abstract] OR "temporal pattern"[Title/Abstract] OR "temporal distribution"[Title/Abstract] OR "epidemiological pattern"[Title/Abstract] OR "epidemiological trend"[Title/Abstract]) AND ("surveillance"[Title/Abstract] OR "epidemiology"[Title/Abstract] OR "incidence"[Title/Abstract] OR "prevalence"[Title/Abstract] OR "outbreak"[Title/Abstract] OR "epidemic"[Title/Abstract])

name: RSV modeling
term: ("respiratory syncytial virus"[Title/Abstract] OR RSV[Title/Abstract]) AND (model[Title/Abstract] OR modeling[Title/Abstract] OR "mathematical model"[Title/Abstract] OR "statistical model"[Title/Abstract] OR "predictive model"[Title/Abstract] OR "forecasting model"[Title/Abstract] OR "transmission model"[Title/Abstract] OR "epidemiological model"[Title/Abstract] OR "compartmental model"[Title/Abstract] OR "SEIR model"[Title/Abstract] OR "SIR model"[Title/Abstract] OR "agent-based model"[Title/Abstract] OR "simulation"[Title/Abstract] OR "time series"[Title/Abstract] OR "machine learning"[Title/Abstract] OR "artificial intelligence"[Title/Abstract] OR "deep learning"[Title/Abstract] OR "neural network"[Title/Abstract]) AND ("prediction"[Title/Abstract] OR "forecast"[Title/Abstract] OR "transmission"[Title/Abstract] OR "spread"[Title/Abstract] OR "dynamics"[Title/Abstract] OR "epidemic"[Title/Abstract] OR "outbreak"[Title/Abstract] OR "incidence"[Title/Abstract] OR "prevalence"[Title/Abstract] OR "burden"[Title/Abstract])

name: Clinical prediction models
term: ("China"[Affiliation] OR "Chinese"[Affiliation]) AND ("clinical"[Title/Abstract]) AND ("prediction model"[Title/Abstract] OR "predictive model"[Title/Abstract] OR "nomogram"[Title/Abstract] OR "risk score"[Title/Abstract] OR "risk model"[Title/Abstract] OR "logistic regression"[Title/Abstract] OR "machine learning"[Title/Abstract])

name: NHANES
term: ("NHANES"[Title/Abstract] OR "National Health and Nutrition Examination Survey"[Title/Abstract])

name: Vitamin D and respiratory infections
term: ("vitamin D"[MeSH Terms] OR "vitamin D"[All Fields]) AND ("respiratory tract infections"[MeSH Terms] OR "respiratory infection"[Title/Abstract])
